page.title: 10PLAY
page.content: Childrens' games become more grown up as children grow older. A child of five or six might play ring-a-roses, dolls and ted, shops, hairdressers, dolls houses, schools, and many other games. Older children might call these games babyish. Children of between ten and twelve wouldn't really play as much as younger children, but they might play the following: bat and ball, football, talk, races, Queeny, skipping, tag, catch, sunbathing, hoops, hopscotch and quite a few others. Thirteens to adults usually play board games, like chess, Monopoly and more. Old people don't usually play much, they just watch T.V. or read. My favourite games are board games, because they are nice and quiet. Good for rainy days!
